name: Realistic Kimono Clothes With Umbrella
description:
Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.2-0.8. (i used 0.5 for my images)

  • Keys: wearing kimono_clothes, holding umbrella

Very easy to use, just use the keywords with the proper weights. (i used 1.3 as main keyword weight)

You can control the color with the prompt, like "wearing green kimono_clothes". You can also use colorful kimono_clothes and hope for a good seed.

Some of the images are created with Controlnet poses packs, you can find them in my creator page.

It also works with anime, example in the posted images.

Enjoy!
